title: Developmentof basic infrastructure and amenities shall be completed by the Project Proponent/s to the satisfaction of the Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be either for whole or as per phases, of the project
clause_text: Developmentof basic infrastructure and amenities shall be completed by the Project Proponent/s to the satisfaction of the Collector (1) or the Authority, as the case may be either for whole or as per phases, of the project.
